channel.title: Travel on Tony Duan
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Tony Duan

item.title: 서울 | Seoul
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Seoul" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Seoul") m K POP at the Airport Ginseng Chicken Soup A TWOSOME PLACE very nice coffee shop. Korean BBQ beef

item.title: 臺北 | Taipei
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Taipei" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Tokyo") m

item.title: 東京 | Tokyo
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Tokyo" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Tokyo") m

item.title: 重庆 | ChongQing
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "ChongQing" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="2017 ebay outing ChongQing") m My Second group photo in ebay family:

item.title: Hà Nội | Hanoi
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Hanoi" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Hanoi") m coffee Egg coffee @ The Giang Café and Coconut coffee @ Cong Caphe .Two are in my top 10 coffee list. Food Street food is health and crazy good. Other Full of motorbike and Traffic jam

item.title: 濟州島 | Jeju Island
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Jeju Island" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="2016 ebay outing Jeju Island") m My first group photo in ebay family:
